summary:
In J.R.R. Tolkien's fictional world, the Valar are powerful beings, like gods, who help create and shape Middle-earth. They are part of a larger group called the Ainur, who make music to bring the world to life. The Valar are the most mighty among them.

These beings are similar to angels but are also like pagan gods from old stories. They influence what happens in Middle-earth, bringing luck and guiding events. You can read more about them in books like *The Silmarillion* and *Unfinished Tales*.
title: Valar
